Today on the Causeway Coast, White Park Bay and Portballintrae are lighting up with 4 ft @ 10s WNW swell and a moderate 11 mph SSE wind. Best surf times are from 08:50 to 15:57. Tomorrow, conditions drop as fresh 35 mph ESE winds blow through, making it blown out and not producing. On the day after, expect 4 ft @ 12s WNW with light 4 mph NE winds, offering a cleaner surf at White Park Bay and Portballintrae. Best: today.
